game.name: Stock Fighter
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wall Street meets street fighting! Engage in arcade-style trade duels where you buy low, sell high to drive your opponent into bankruptcy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wall Street meets street fighting! Engage in arcade-style trade duels where you buy low, sell high to drive your opponent into bankruptcy.
